customerEmail.title: customerEmail
customerEmail.description: Customer email, which is used to identify the customer, and receive the email confirmation after booking the inspection.

customerFirstName.title: customerFirstName
customerFirstName.description: Customer's First Name, is required for identifying the customer.

customerLastName.title: customerLastName
customerLastName.description: Customer's Last Name, is required for identifying the customer.

inspectDateTime.title: inspectDateTime
inspectDateTime.description: Customer's preferred inspection date and time.

propertyName.title: propertyName
propertyName.description: a text, which starts with "P" to identify the property that the customer would like to inspect.
